references.reason: This paper is a technical report on GPT-4, a large language model that is highly relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: Scibert: A pretrained language model for scientific text
references.reason: This paper introduces SciBERT, a domain-specific language model that is relevant to the current work on domain adaptation.

references.paper_title: Adam: A method for stochastic optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces Adam, an optimization algorithm that is used in the current work.
This paper introduces the Mistral 7B model, which is the base model for the current work.

references.paper_title: SaulLM-7B: A pioneering large language model for law
references.reason: This paper introduces SaulLM-7B, a previous model developed by the same authors that is improved upon in the current work.
